an10.45:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, raja mahesiya saddhim nisinno hoti.
an10.45:1.5: Mahesi va bhikkhum disva sitam patukaroti, bhikkhu va mahesim disva sitam patukaroti.
an10.45:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, raja bahukicco bahukaraniyo annataram itthim gantva na sarati:
an10.45:2.4: ‘na kho idha anno koci pavisati, annatra pabbajitena.
an10.45:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ranno antepure annataram ratanam nassati.
an10.45:3.3: ‘na kho idha anno koci pavisati, annatra pabbajitena.
an10.45:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ranno antepure abbhantara guyhamanta bahiddha sambhedam gacchanti.
an10.45:4.3: ‘na kho idha anno koci pavisati, annatra pabbajitena.
an10.45:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ranno antepure pita va puttam pattheti putto va pitaram pattheti.
an10.45:5.3: ‘na kho idha anno koci pavisati, annatra pabbajitena.
an10.45:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, raja nicatthaniyam ucce thane thapeti.
an10.45:6.2: Yesam tam amanapam tesam evam hoti:
an10.45:7.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, raja uccatthaniyam nice thane thapeti.
an10.45:7.2: Yesam tam amanapam tesam evam hoti:
an10.45:8.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, raja akale senam uyyojeti.
an10.45:8.2: Yesam tam amanapam tesam evam hoti:
an10.45:9.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, raja kale senam uyyojetva antaramaggato nivattapeti.
an10.45:9.2: Yesam tam amanapam tesam evam hoti:
an10.45:10.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, ranno antepuram hatthisammaddam assasammaddam rathasammaddam rajaniyani rupasaddagandharasaphotthabbani, yani na pabbajitassa saruppani.
an10.45:10.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa adinava rajantepurappavesane”ti.
